revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_SerpentLowerHump'''
(''no parameter'')
Increases the floor clipping by 4 units in order to lower the hump below the surface. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Serpent}} and derived classes.
